name: devonboarder-aar-system
description: Schema-driven AAR (After Action Report) system for DevOnboarder

scripts.aar:test: npm run aar:validate ../docs/AAR/data/*.aar.json 2>/dev/null || echo 'No AAR data files found'
scripts.aar:validate-schema: NODE_PATH=./node_modules node -e "const Ajv = require('ajv'); const addFormats = require('ajv-formats'); const schema = require('../docs/AAR/schema/aar.schema.json'); const ajv = new Ajv(); addFormats(ajv); ajv.compile(schema); console.log('AAR schema is valid');"
scripts.aar:validate-template: NODE_PATH=./node_modules node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const Handlebars = require('handlebars'); const template = fs.readFileSync('../docs/AAR/templates/aar.hbs', 'utf8'); Handlebars.compile(template); console.log('Handlebars template is valid');"
scripts.aar:lint-rendered: markdownlint ../docs/AAR/reports/*.md || echo 'No rendered AAR files found'
scripts.aar:full-test: npm run aar:test && npm run aar:test-golden && npm run aar:lint-rendered
scripts.aar:install: npm install handlebars ajv ajv-formats glob
scripts.aar:stack:up: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up aar-ui -d
scripts.aar:stack:down: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml down aar-ui
scripts.aar:stack:logs: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml logs -f aar-ui
scripts.aar:stack:build: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml build aar-ui
scripts.aar:stack:prod: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml -f docker-compose.prod.yaml up aar-ui -d

author: DevOnboarder Team
